addons.name: Link in Tab
addons.description:
Link in Tab allows you to:
- Left click => open link in new tab
- Left double-click => open link in browser
- Middle click => open link in browser and close current tab
addons.fullDescription:
Link in Tab will change how links are opened:

    Left click - opens link in new tab
    Double-click - opens link in browser (default action)
    Middle click - opens link in browser and close message tab (if message was opened in a tab)
